mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.num AS "num", a.ori_vehicle_num AS "oriVehicleNum", a.new_vehicle_num AS "newVehicleNum", a.name AS "name", a.id_card AS "idCard", a.allowed_drive_model AS "allowedDriveModel", a.initial_date AS "initialDate", a.qua_cert_num AS "quaCertNum", a.qua_cert_initial_date AS "quaCertInitialDate", a.phone_num AS "phoneNum", a.address AS "address", a.boarding_time AS "boardingTime", a.query_code AS "queryCode", a.step AS "step"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM z_operator_business_change a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND a.num LIKE '%'||#{num}||'%' '%'+#{num}+'%' concat('%',#{num},'%')
AND a.ori_vehicle_num LIKE '%'||#{oriVehicleNum}||'%' '%'+#{oriVehicleNum}+'%' concat('%',#{oriVehicleNum},'%')
AND a.new_vehicle_num LIKE '%'||#{newVehicleNum}||'%' '%'+#{newVehicleNum}+'%' concat('%',#{newVehicleNum},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.phone_num LIKE '%'||#{phoneNum}||'%' '%'+#{phoneNum}+'%' concat('%',#{phoneNum},'%')
AND a.boarding_time BETWEEN #{beginBoardingTime} AND #{endBoardingTime}
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
ORDER BY a.update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO z_operator_business_change( id, create_by, update_by, del_flag, create_date, update_date, remarks, num, ori_vehicle_num, new_vehicle_num, name, id_card, allowed_drive_model, initial_date, qua_cert_num, qua_cert_initial_date, phone_num, address, boarding_time, query_code, step ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{updateBy.id}, #{delFlag}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{num}, #{oriVehicleNum}, #{newVehicleNum}, #{name}, #{idCard}, #{allowedDriveModel}, #{initialDate}, #{quaCertNum}, #{quaCertInitialDate}, #{phoneNum}, #{address}, #{boardingTime}, #{queryCode}, #{step} )
mapper.update: UPDATE z_operator_business_change SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, num = #{num}, ori_vehicle_num = #{oriVehicleNum}, new_vehicle_num = #{newVehicleNum}, name = #{name}, id_card = #{idCard}, allowed_drive_model = #{allowedDriveModel}, initial_date = #{initialDate}, qua_cert_num = #{quaCertNum}, qua_cert_initial_date = #{quaCertInitialDate}, phone_num = #{phoneNum}, address = #{address}, boarding_time = #{boardingTime}, query_code = #{queryCode}, step = #{step} WHERE id = #{id}
